title: Ayurveda Y Acupuntura (Paperback)
author: Frank Ros
cleaned_text: Ayurveda Y Acupuntura (Paperback) Dr. Frank Ros is a Doctor of Ayurveda medicine (Ayurveda, Parangata), Diploma in Naturopathy and Acupuncture Ayurvedic; is a member of theNaturopathic Practitioners Association and of the Complementary Medicine Association and Life Member of Acupuncture Society of India (Jaipur). He is a professional of Naturopathy, Ayurveda and marmapuncture. His first work on marmapuncture, was published in United States of America in 1994 and has been translated into several Languages. In 2008, he published the work Marmapuncture (Theory and practice of Ayurvedic acupuncture), for first time in Spanish.
